headline: Best Buy: A Beaten-Down, Attractively Priced, 5% Yielder Hiding In Plain Sight (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Best Buy is a buy due to improved fundamentals, a secure 5%+ dividend yield, and likely tailwinds from declining interest rates. Click for more on BBY stock.
